pullRequest.title: Change hot compact way to level merge

commit.message:
Merge pull request #1550 from zhanglingzhe0820/recover_TsFileProcessor

recover TsFileProcessor(may not pass ci)

nodes.bodyText: unified to 5 or 10 to keep same as iotdb-engine.properties as well
Is tsFileManagementStrategy a config which could only be modified at the first time starting IoTDB? If so, you may have to add it to IoTDBConfigCheck to abandon changing it when restarting.

Suggested change
